titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Hong Kong subject collection
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Aparna Mukherjee

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-07-14T15:18-0700

change.item: Updated extent statement and date range to include new increment and added note about Boxes 32-118 not being described.
Revised to update encoding and add unitid.
Updated extent statement and date range to include new increment; added unit identification number.
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Hong Kong subject collection)//EN" "reg_188.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

did.abstract: Corporation annual reports, serial issues, bulletins, newsletters, pamphlets, clippings, press summaries, election campaign literature, other printed matter, videotape and sound tape reel recordings of television and radio news broadcasts, and memorabilia relating to political, social and economic conditions in Hong Kong, and especially to business, finance, education, social services, and governmental administration.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Hong Kong subject collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1991, with increments received in subsequent years.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Corporation annual reports, serial issues, bulletins, newsletters, pamphlets, clippings, press summaries, election campaign literature, other printed matter, videotape and sound tape reel recordings of television and radio news broadcasts, and memorabilia relating to political, social and economic conditions in Hong Kong, and especially to business, finance, education, social services, and governmental administration.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Reports, journals, magazines, newsletters, brochures, statements of accounts, leaflets, survey, financial fact books, commemmorative edition, proposal, intelligence reports and bulletins, arranged in alphabetical order.

did.unittitle: China Entertainment and Land Investment Co.,
China Underwriters Life and General Insurance Co.,
Hoe Hin Pak Fah Yeow Manufactory,
Hong Kong and China Gas Co.,
Hong Kong Association of Accounting Technicians,
Hongkong and Kowloon Wharf and Godown Co.,
Keng Fong Sin Kee Construction and Investment Co.,
South Sea Textile Manufacturing Company Ltd.,
Wah Kwong Shipping and Investment Co.(Hong Kong),

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Citizenship registration application and guide, leaflet, information kit, draft Hong Kong Order and press release. Includes material written in Chinese.

did.unittitle: General guide to the British nationality selection scheme,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Bulletins, newsletters, newspapers, memoranda, magazines, prospectus, research report, advertisement, journal, college manual, yearbook, university calendar, career guide and report on education. Some of these materials are partly in Chinese.

did.unittitle: Hong Kong Baptist College research report,
Hong Kong Institute of Language in Education,
Hong Kong University of Science and Technology,

unittitle.title: Journal of the Hong Kong Tertiary Institution

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Leaflets, brochures, news summary, sports publication, prospectus for the performing arts, souvenirs, speech, magazine, journals, newsletters, reports, summary of editorials, newspapers, forecast of visitors, legislative council questions, information regarding the relationship between the central government and the local entities, clippings, and materials about the government information services and the House of Commons. Parts of these materials are in Chinese.

did.unittitle: Daily summary of newspapers by London office,
Hong Kong Academy of Performing Arts,
Hong Kong Dragon Boat Festival international races,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Bulletins, consumer price index, report, official publications and newspapers.

did.unittitle: Hong Kong Institute of Economic Science,
Office of the Commissioner of Insurance,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Newsletters, government lists, map, daily press summaries, electoral ordinances, membership application, brochures, bulletins, reference papers, magazine and official records of Hong Kong urban council.

did.unittitle: Great Britain, Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs,
Guide to the Legislative Council elections,
Hong Kong civil and miscellaneous lists,
Hong Kong district board electoral boundaries map
Office of the Executive and Legislative Councils,
The Friends of Hong Kong committee,
Family Planning Association of Hong Kong,
Hong Kong Association for the Mentally Handicapped,
Hong Kong Journal of Mental Health,
Hong Kong Social Security Appeal Board,
Society for the rehabilitation of offenders,
News, views and comments on labour matters,
Hong Kong, Criminal and Law Enforcement Injuries Compensation Boards,
Chinese Coordination Center of World Evangelism,
Diocesan Echo: The Diocese of Hong Kong and Macao,
Sunday Examiner: Catholic news of the week,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Brochures, journal, leaflets, newsletter, news weekly, and reports.

did.unittitle: Rest of collection not yet described
